mean_cn: vt. 使协调，使同步，校准时间；  vi. 同时发生，以同样速度进行
mean_en: to cause (things) to agree in time or to make (things) happen at the same time and speed
word_etyma: syn相同 + chron时间 + ize动词后缀 → synchronize 同时发生
sentence: The swimmers beautifully synchronized their movements.
sentence_trans: 花样游泳运动员们的动作优美并且一致。
